_header: We been healed that were sick
Note: Attributed to Ps. 2 in the MS.
Subjects: scripture, Engl. trans. of; translations; Christ, healing work of
_description: Christ’s saving work — one couplet translating ‘Sanati sumus’ (Is. 53.5) which precedes it in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
We ben heled þat eer wer sekeIblissed be þat wonder
                    leche

             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
